original: “Te, bhikkhave, sattā suparihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya parihīnā.
analyzed: ▁te ▁bhikkhave ▁sattā ▁su pari hīn ā ▁ye ▁ariy āya ▁paññāya ▁pari hīn ā

original: Te diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharanti savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ;
analyzed: ▁te ▁diṭṭh eva ▁dhamme ▁dukkhaṃ ▁viharanti ▁sa vi ghāt aṃ ▁sa u pāyās aṃ ▁s apariḷāh aṃ

original: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
Te, bhikkhave, sattā aparihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya aparihīnā.
Te diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharanti avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ;
analyzed: ▁te ▁diṭṭh eva ▁dhamme ▁sukhaṃ ▁viharanti ▁avi ghāt aṃ ▁anu pāyās aṃ ▁ apariḷāh aṃ

original: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.

analyzed: ▁ pi ha yanti ▁ hās apaññā naṃ

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
